title: Google Android Pixel Security Update - May 2021
content:
Hello Pixel Community,

We have provided the monthly Android / Pixel update for May 2021. All supported Pixel devices running Android 11 will receive these software updates as part of the May 2021 update, which begins rolling out to users today. We encourage you to check your Android version and update to receive the latest features. 

Build numbers:
Global:
Pixel 3 (XL): RQ2A.210505.002
Pixel 3a (XL): RQ2A.210505.002
Pixel 4 (XL): RQ2A.210505.002
Pixel 4a: RQ2A.210505.002
Pixel 4a (5G): RQ2A.210505.003
Pixel 5: RQ2A.210505.003

The OTA update will roll out in phases depending on carrier and device. Users will receive a notification once it becomes available.

Details of security fixes are found in this link : 
https://source.android.com/security/bulletin


Thanks,
Google Pixel Support Team
